1313.content:
You run across the nymph's mountain sized chest, hoping to reach her nose as quickly as possible before she goes along with her tease and eats the last bit of her sandwich.

when you reach to her chin, you put as much strength as you can into your legs and you jump as high as you could, arm reaching out for her nose. The distance is swiftly closing in, her nose is right at your fingertips! You're going to make it!

But all of that excitement within your dwindles away as you feel your right foot getting caught on Edith's lower lip, you swipe your hand in the air to touch her nose but find that you are but a centimeter too short. You then notice the large gap of Edith's mouth below you as you fall inside.

*GLOMPH*

"Mmmph!?" Your body falling within her mouth startles the busty blonde making her instinctively close her mouth around you.

Around you, you can only see the pink, wet insides of her mouth. Her pearly white teeth blocking your only exit. You can feel her wet and squishy tongue as you plant your hands on it to try and stand up and get your balance.

"Hey!" You yell to get her attention "Let me out of here!"

You notice that Edith doesn't do anything right away so you take matters into your own hands.

You...
1313.title: Unsuspecting A Tasty Snack

13132.content:
You try pushing on Edith's tongue hoping she'll do something but what happens next?

Does it work?
13132.title: Start pushing against her tongue

131322.content:
You then heard her voice. "Mmmm tasty." You did not like the sound of that. Just then the tongue started moving and rubbing all over you. Edith was actually tasting you much to your disgust and discomfort. "Hey! What are you doing?!" you shouted. You tried holding on to the tongue but it was slippery and out of control. You then started to slide down the abyss that was her throat. "Is she trying to eat ME?!" you panicked. Once you were close enough to her throat, Edith swallowed you on instinct as you shouted, "EEDDIITH!" You squeezed down her throat, through her esophagus and plopped down to her stomach. Once you landed in the depths of the hungry nymph, you bounced around like it was a trampoline until you came to a complete stop. You laid down flat for a minute until you came to the sound of the stomach growling. You moaned and groaned standing up and couldn't believe that you were actually eaten by a hot lady nymph. You then heard a familiar voice, "Little guy? Are you ok in there?" You then shouted, "OK?! You ate me! Why would you do that?!" "Sorry. You kinda tasted good for a toy." Edith giggled. You moaned as you looked around the stomach. It actually looked pretty spacious on the inside but probably cuz you shrunk. Not only that but it was kinda warm in here. You can also hear noises like the growling in her belly as well as the sound of a drum. You guessed it was her heart beating and echoing in the distance. You then noticed the sandwich she ate floating in liquid nearby. You realized it was the stomach acid! That stuff burns like fire if you touched or got near it and even worse, you could get digested! Panicking at the thought, you tried to get out of here. Hopefully Edith can help you. You call out to her, "Edith!" "Yes?" She answered. "Can you please help me get out of here?"


What does she say?
131322.title: Eaten up by Edith Up.

1313222.content:
You waited for Edith to respond. Finally she answered, "Better idea. You can climb out of my belly." You were shocked at her response. "What?! But I already climbed your legs, waist and...chest which was tiring enough as it is" You complained as you pounded the stomach walls in frustration. Your world in her stomach suddenly shook as Edith giggled afterwards. You must've tickled her from the inside. Edith then spoke up, "Aww but it was such a good and ticklish feeling." You then complained some more, "I'm still hungry by the way!" Edith answered back, "Well I still have this little bit of sandwich left. I can save it for you if you climb out." Well there's some good news. She's actually gonna spare you what's left of her sandwich. Another thought crossed your mind, "But if I do try and climb out, what if something happens? Like what if I fall in your stomach acid? You DO know what will happen, right?" You asked in a worried tone. Edith answered, "Don't worry little one, the magic that has been cast upon you actually protects you from such dangerous things." You were surprised at this information. She then continued, "In fact, you can actually swim around in my belly. Maybe play with some of the food I ate that hasn't been digested or just relax in there." "Wow" you thought to yourself. You never thought this would be possible. Still, you had to be sure though as you looked at the acid. You decided to test this spell by sticking your hand in the dangerous liquid. After a second, you pull back your hand to see it in one piece. Not to mention it was kinda soothing. "Wow! It's like a hot tub." You said out loud. Edith giggled at your reaction. "Yes it is. So you want to stay in my tummy?"


You thought about it and decided...
1313222.title: Better idea...

13132221.content:
"Ok. Why not?" you answered. Like you said, you were rather exhausted after climbing earlier. You could use a break and this little "hot tub" inside Edith will do just fine.

Edith spoke up, "Well alright dear. Just let me know when you're ready to come out, ok?" Could this mean Edith will actually let you out afterwards? You can only hope. Right now you just want some time to yourself. You then stood up and got ready for a dip in the acid since the magic made you immune. With one jump, you splashed right in and enjoyed the soothing yet also dangerous liquid.

Outside, Edith felt you splashing around in her stomach, put a hand on it and giggled. She was glad you were having fun.

Back inside, you were floating around, enjoying the warm comfort in the stomach... even if it smelled a bit. You then noticed the food she ate earlier was sinking in the acid. You decided to dive down and see where it went. As you followed it, you saw other food down below such as pancakes, eggs and various fruits...and lots of them! "Wow! She eats alot!" you thought in amazement. Then again, Edith's a big girl...and not just because you were small. You then noticed the food was starting to dissolve. Looks like digestion was starting. Your world was starting to shake a bit. You then quickly swam out of the acid before something else happened. Once you were on dry land again, you noticed the acid simply slid off of you. Looks like the magic made you wet proof. You turned around to see a whirlpool in Edith's stomach. It carried the food she ate down somewhere. Once it was over, the acid came back up and was pretty much clear of anything. You made a good call climbing out, otherwise you would have been pulled down too. Once it was safe, you dipped right back in and lounged around. It was relaxing. The warmth of your hot tub along with the sound of air rushing and the heart like a drum. You actually nodded off a bit.

A little while later, you were awake again and still in the stomach. You yawned a bit and stretched yourself. You then heard giggling from Edith, of course and spoke up, "Well well, awake are we?" "What? I wasn't asleep." you denied. Edith however wasn't buying it, "Really? Cuz I'm pretty sure I heard snoring in there." she said as she patted her belly. "Yeah ok." you said sarcastically. "Well, I'm ready to come out now, can you let me out now?" you asked nicely. You didn't hear Edith answer for a few seconds and then she finally answered, "Yeah, about that actually..."

You were in fear at that response. What did she mean by that???
13132221.title: Ok. Why not?

131322211.content:
"YOU MEAN I CAN'T GET OUT?!" was literally the one thing you shout in fear. It was so loud, it echoed beyond the cavernous stomach. "Please calm yourself, little one." Edith answered. "I haven't even explained yet."

You can only imagine the horror she has say about leaving her body. Still, it didn't seem like you had a choice and just listened. Edith spoke up again, "So, here's the thing: Believe it or not, I have had...well let's say "Intruders" peeping at me from time to time. When they are caught, I punish them by shrinking them down to bite size and imprisoning them in my stomach. If they want out, they have to go through a long and EXHAUSTING journey to get out."


Once Edith was finished, you were once again bewildered, "So what? Now I have to go through the same thing?" you asked. Edith thought of something and answered, "No no, instead for you I can make it easy...and by "easy" I mean "less dangerous" since it is my fault you're in there. First I'm going to give you a power that can help you change size. If you need to get through something, you'll automatically get small enough to fit right through and once you're out, you'll be back to normal. Well, normal-ish really. More than likely, you will find Alot of tight spaces. Another thing is, there's some little things inside me that act as bodyguards. If they see you, they'll cling on to you, making your journey difficult, but you can pull them right off. Other than that, the rest is up to you." she finally finished.


Your head was spinning after hearing sooo much. "Oh boy." you moaned. "Hey, think of it this way: this can be another fun game to play." Edith said. She actually had a point. It actually reminds you of videogame you enjoy playing. You agreed to this, "Ok. I'll do it then." you said even though you didn't really have a choice.

"That's the spirit!" Edith chirped. "But let me do one thing first."


"Power toooo... CHANGE SIZE!!!"

You heard her shout and next thing you know, you were glowing. Looks like it worked. "Wow. That feels kinda nice." you said to yourself.
Edith spoke up again, "Ok, you're all set. Good luck my little morsel." She giggled. "Uh, sure, thanks." you said while frowning at the nickname she just gave you. You just shook it off and then walked to the stomach wall and got to climbing. It was slippery, so you had to get a real good grip. You were already at the exit of the stomach and saw a small opening. You just had to trust Edith and the power she just gave you. You tried sticking your head through...only for you to get small enough to fit. It actually worked! You were able to squeeze right in. You were able to use both arms and legs to continue climbing, kinda like how you saw it in the action movies. Still, you had quite a way to go, but you'll make out just fine...right?


To be continued...

(Author's note: In case you are wondering, yes this was in fact inspired by the hit video game, "Mario and Luigi: Bowser's inside story". I never got the original, just the remake, but either way it's really fun! I do not own anything!)
131322211.title: Edith's inside story.

1313222111.content:
You made it out of the stomach and kept climbing away from it. Up ahead, you saw not one but three choices on where to head to next. "Oh boy." You said to yourself. Maybe Edith can help. You called out to her, "Hey, Edith!" "Yes?" she answered. "I'm out of your stomach now. Which way do I go now?" you asked hoping for an answer. "I'm afraid you'll have to figure it out yourself, sweetie. Wouldn't be much of a challenge now, would it?" Edith giggled. All you could do was sigh, "ok". You thought about it and decided to try the first path. You walked into the tight space, getting smaller of course. Once you were in, you were then transported through a tube and really fast like an arrow from a crossbow! "WHOOAA!!" was all you could shout.


Who knows where you could end up now...
1313222111.title: Lost in inner space.

13132221111.content:
After your crazy ride through the tube, you were then spat up and fell down a long way until you landed with a splat. You got up and noticed something, a tall bone like structure. You walked closer and rubbed it. It was actual bones! You then heard Edith's voice, "Oh my, that feels odd." You talked to her, "Hey Edith, I just fell down somewhere and there's a tall boney thing here." She answered, "Well no wonder, I believe you're in my left leg."

Weird. In no time you went from her stomach to one of her legs. You looked up and noticed the exit was all the way up... meaning you had to climb again. You looked at her bones and they looked pretty close like a ladder. This will be easy then. You grabbed on and climbed. While you were at it, you asked Edith something, "I'm climbing up your bones now. It's not hurting you is it?" "No, not at all. You much to small to do that." she assured. You shook your head, "Ok" and kept climbing until you reached the exit and squeezed back into the area you started at.


You looked at the other pathways and thought about the one farthest from you. That way could lead to the other leg. So you decided the middle path would be your best bet.

You squeezed right in and transported somewhere...but where to next?
13132221111.title: Leggo my leg.

131322211111.content:
The path you chose lead you somewhere that was pretty loud actually. It sounded like, "THUMPA THUMPA THUMPA!" Even you could guess where you were headed: Edith's heart! You kept squeezing through until you arrived, only to keep getting bounced around. It was like a trampoline that forced you to bounce. "Hey, this is fun." you said actually enjoying the ride.


Outside, Edith felt a tickle in her chest and put a hand on it while giggling. She wondered if it was you and tried talking to you. "Little one? Where are you?"


Inside, you heard Edith's voice and answered, "Edith! I'm in your heart!" while you continued bouncing. "Really? Does that mean you like me?" she jokingly asked. You blushed at that response and quickly answered back, "No! No! I mean I'm literally in your heart!" Edith giggled, "Oh relax. I knew what you meant. Looks like you're getting closer. By the way, that tickles!" You chuckled a bit at what she said. Being in here reminds you of when you did have a trampoline a while back. You decided to re-live those good old days with somersaults and backflips. After a little while, you decided to press on. You saw an exit and literally jumped for it. You grabbed on and shrunk again to squeeze right in transporting you somewhere.

Hopefully closer to the outside world...
131322211111.title: The way to a nymph's heart.

1313222111111.content:
After your rather exciting adventure through the heart, you got transported to another area. This one had a few more different pathways to choose from.

"Oh man, not this again." you complained. You thought about the choices. You decided not to take the middle again because you felt like the same choice wasn't always right. You decided to go through the third pathway and got transported somewhere.

But where?
1313222111111.title: More paths.

13132221111111.content:
After squeezing through the next tube, you landed in some sort of fleshy tunnel. All you could do was move forward. Not even a minute later you then saw something up ahead. It looked like...more bones? These ones looked familiar. Like the ones you saw in Edith's leg. Could you be in her arm this time? Then the flesh around you could be the muscles. You decided to travel a little deeper. Afterwards, you were close to her hand seeing more of Edith's bones. You were quite amazed.


Unknown to you, something was watching you. It wasn't friendly looking either. It saw you as an enemy. It then dropped from the fleshy ceiling.

You turned around and walked back to the exit but we're stopped by the creature lurking around, landing right in front of you. "Whoa! What the..." you shouted as You jumped back in surprise.

Getting a closer look, you saw that it was a limbless creature with a green vegetable for a face and pupiless eyes. It was also smaller than you. It pointed it's fingers at you and shouted, "INTRUDER!"

Wait. Could these be the bodyguards that Edith was talking about? You then realized that you were in trouble now. You tried talking to it, "No wait!" but it was futile as the creature grabbed onto to you. Thankfully you remembered what Edith said and just pulled it off you and threw it behind you and ran in the other direction. However, the creature wasn't alone. As you continued your escape, more of the bodyguards dropped down in front of you in attempt to capture you...and then who knows what after that. Seeing that they were small, you simply jumped over them and kept running. You finally made it to the exit and squeezed on through the tube and found yourself back to the previous area you were in.


You thought about going to the middle path since more than likely the other path would lead you to the other arm. You quickly ran right in and we're transported somewhere else. Hopefully those bodyguards wouldn't catch up to you.
13132221111111.title: Arm-ed and dangerous.

131322211111111.content:
After squeezing through yet another tube, instead of falling you were actually floating! Also, you were hearing roaring winds like there was a tornado. You looked around and saw the chamber that you were in was inflating and deflating like a balloon. All that told you one thing:


You were in Edith's lungs!

This was pretty cool. You could use the strong winds to float even higher and reach the next tube. You proceeded to do so while at the same time do some loops. "Alright! Whoo!" you shouted. But your fun was short lived. While you were upside down, you saw the bodyguards coming for you! You also noticed they were flying like helicopters. Weird, but now is no time to ask questions.

You tried to float away from them, but they managed to surround you. Just one chance...you had to somehow get rid of all of them if you were to escape. You then got into position and waited for the right moment. Then they all charged at you! Could this be it? Have they won?

No, cuz at the last minute, you flew up fast, causing the guards to ram right into each other... mainly their heads. "That's gotta hurt!" you winced. They all fell unconscious and down they went. You were victorious! You kept floating up and made it out of the lungs. You shrunk again and squeezed into the tube to your next destination.


Wherever that could be...
131322211111111.title: Outta my airway!

1313222111111111.content:
You popped out into another chamber and saw only one thing: another tall boney structure. This one also looked like a ladder. It seemed to go up and up and up. After seeing the leg and the arm, only one thing came to mind:

This was Edith's spine!

You could use this to climb all the way to her head! From there, you'll have a number of exits to choose from. Freedom was almost yours. You climbed again, hopefully for the last time.

It was an exhausting climb, but it was going to be worth it. After reaching the top, you saw a hole and jumped up through it and saw something big.

"Whoa! Is this..."
1313222111111111.title: I got your back, Edith!

13132221111111111.content:
You saw something big, pink, wrinkly, looked squishy and had bolts of electricity around it.

This was Edith's brain!

You were amused at this sight. "Well this is something!" You wanted to get closer but didn't want to risk getting zapped. You also happened to see her "memory bank" as it was called. You saw her precious memories like when she and her sisters were born. As nice as they were, you didn't want to invade a lady's privacy and focused on leaving.

You walked around Edith's head and found another path. Hopefully one that will finally get outside. You jumped right in and were sliding down really fast.

After a long and fun slide, you flew right off and smacked right into something. Looking at it, you saw it was shaped like a punching bag and looking down and around, it was all too familiar. The abyss down below, the white boulders, the long slimy ground.

You were in Edith's mouth! You were also hanging on to her uvula! Freedom was in reach. With one swing, you jumped and landed on her tongue. You then called out to her, "Edith!" "Hmm?" was all you heard. You continued, "I'm in here, in your mouth!" You then saw her open her mouth and you quickly jumped out onto a table. Finally! You were out!

You were flat on the table gasping in relief. You then turned around and saw Edith smiling down at you. "Hey." was all you said.

The plump nymph gently brought her hands down and picked you up, bringing you to her face and spoke. "Well look who's finally made it out!" she chirped as she gave you a quick little kiss. "Mwah!" You blushed a little at that moment. Edith spoke again, "So, did you have fun inside me?" You answered, "Yeah, you could say it was a "fantastic voyage". Edith giggled, "Well I don't know if that's supposed to mean anything, but I'm glad to hear that." She then remembered something, "Oh right!" she said as she grabbed the last bit of sandwich from earlier and gave it to you. "As I promised." she said.

You were drooling at your lunch and went crazy eating away like Taz. In no time you ate it all up and burped a little afterwards.You then said to her, "Thanks. You know what's funny? I actually forgot that I was hungry after...well you know." You then laid on her hands as she giggled. "Well I hope you saved room for a little something extra special." she sang. She then brought you over to the table you were on earlier and showed you something. You turned around and was wide eyed at what you saw.

A tray of fresh baked cookies! There were lots of them. Some were chocolate chip, oatmeal raisin, and even macadamia nut!

"Surprise!" Edith shouted. You were indeed surprised and tried saying something but couldn't find the right words. "Whaa...how... where did?" you stuttered.

Edith laughed at your reaction and said, "I baked them, you little silly!" "When???" you simply said. "What did you think I was doing while I was waiting for you to come out?" Edith said with a smirk. "That makes sense." you said.

You looked at the cookies and couldn't stop. You were drooling. The smell was also getting to you. You just had to ask. "Soooo...may I?" you turned to Edith and asked pointing at the cookies. "Well of course. There's enough for both of us." Edith kindly said. You then jumped off her hands and landed on a macadamia cookie shouting, "WHOO HOO!"

Being small, you could eat a whole cookie and be full for a day...not that you really cared. Anything to satisfy your sweet tooth. You started to Chow down on your cookie and you loved it so much. It was still warm and soft. You looked up at Edith and saw her eating away at the cookies too. Boy can she bake. While you were still eating your cookie, you couldn't help but stare at her lovely form. She was rather THICC as most people would put it. Her hair was really long and blonde which was something you actually liked. After a minute of staring, you snapped out of it and blushed a little. You then got back to finishing your cookie while thinking back to your day with the beautiful food nymph so far. Sure it was a bit...bumpy at the start but after a little accident here and there plus a little adventure around her innards and finally a sandwich and dessert, you could get used to some fun time with Edith and her sisters. After you finished your cookie, you laid flat on the table muttering something you felt like saying...


"I think I'm going to like it here."

Edith then looked down, smiled at you and said, "So my little morsel. After you rest, I would like to take you outside to one of my favorite spots, so we can play some more. Sound good?" You simply nodded your head, "yes". You then wondered what she had in mind but decided to rest for now.
13132221111111111.title: Getting out of her head and outside at last!

131322211111111111.content:
You've been lounging around on the same spot where the cookie you ate was. You couldn't get over how delicious it was. Boy, if Edith can bake something THAT delicious, imagine what else she can make.

A while later, you stretched your arms and legs and finally stood up. You saw Edith was still eating cookies, but there was surprisingly still plenty left. Edith noticed you and flew over to you. "Hey there little guy. How are you feeling?" she kindly asked. "Like I just had the best dessert ever." you answered. Edith smiled, "That's good." as she finished her cookie. "So how about we go to that favorite place of mine? I promise you and I will have a really fun time." Edith said offering her hand for you to hop on. "Ok." you simply said as you got on her hand, grabbing hold of her fingers. You then both left Edith's house.


You couldn't believe that Edith lived in a place that's both an Arctic glacier and what appeared to be a huge hot kitchen. Talk about a classic case of hot and cold. Edith was flying around the Arctic region while you enjoyed the view. You saw some stuff that you would never find in the Arctic region of your world such as watermelons floating around, giant forks with faces and what appears to be a school of piranhas. This made you want to ask Edith something: "What's this place called again?" Edith explained, "Gourmand land. Where food is either nice and cold or fresh from the oven... literally." "Gotcha." you replied back.

Edith was starting to fly lower. You must be getting close to her favorite spot. She landed on what appears to be a huge round and flat iceberg. It was big enough to be a hockey rink. "Here we are!" Edith said. You were a bit confused as to how this plain empty area was Edith's usual spot so of course you had to ask her, "Sooo, what are we doing here?" "Ooh, I'm so glad you asked!" Edith said sounding a bit excited


"We are going to..."
131322211111111111.title: Continue

1313222111111111111.content:
"Ice skate!" Edith squealed. You were surprised at her idea. Given her... figure, you'd never guess ice skating was one of her favorite activities. "Really?" you asked not sounding confident about her idea. Edith answered, "yes, really." then asked, "Don't you ever ice skate?" As sad as your response was, you had to tell her, "Not really. In fact, where I'm from, it takes a miracle for it to even snow." Edith frowned a bit at your answer, "Well that doesn't sound fun where you're from. No offense." "Nah. You're not wrong really." Edith perked up again and said, "Ok then. I'm going to teach you how to skate." She then placed you on the ice and spoke again, "In fact, you can watch me do the basics, some neat tricks, and a big finish to top it all off."

Edith then flew to the center of the area and prepared to show you but not after some stretching and warm ups. All you could do was watch and learn. Edith stood motionless for a few seconds and then started skating around like an actual figure skater! She preformed jumps such as axels and waltz, as well as spins like camel and upright.


You were in awe at this. Your eyes were wide eyed. You thought Edith was so majestic, that you couldn't stop staring at her.


Finally, Edith made a big finish and came to a complete stop right in front of you while wiping a little sweat off her head. "Phew!" she said. She then gently picked you up and asked, "So, what did you think?" while smiling at you. "THAT WAS AWESOME!!!" you quickly responded. You realized that you sounded like a silly fanboy and blushed in embarrassment a little while Edith giggled at it. "Uh I mean uhh, yeah you were great. How did you learn to do all that?" you followed up. "Well I had to do something else with my spare time. So are you ready?" She asked. "Uh ok." You said still a bit unsure. Edith smiled, "Great! With you and me skating together, this will be twice as fun!" she squealed again.

Now Edith decides you're her partner? You grew more nervous at that. You worried about how you were going to pull it off. But there lies another problem...


How would you and her skate, despite the size differences?
1313222111111111111.title: Edith on ice.

13132221111111111111.content:
You were about to skate with the lovely and THICC Edith Up, but there still lies the problem: You're still very small. How would this work? You asked her, "So how are we going to do this? You know, with me being small?"

Edith didn't answer, instead she placed you back on the ice, touched your forehead with her sparkly finger and then...


*POOF*


Next thing you knew, you looked at yourself and saw that you actually grew a bit! You were surprised. You looked at Edith and saw she was still a bit taller than you but not big enough to eat you again, heaven forbid that happens again.

"There! Now your ready." Edith said. "Wait, did you just..." you tried asking but Edith already explained, "Yes, I used my size changing magic to make you bigger." "Wait. That was actually possible this whole time and you never even told me???" you asked in bewilderment. "You never asked." Edith shot back as you facepalmed yourself making her giggle. Edith spoke up again, "Oh and also, it's temporary. Thought it was best to wait for the best moment." You understood, "Ok, fair enough."

Well enough talk, it's time.


"So, shall we my dear?" Edith said as she held out her hand asking for yours. Being a gentleman, you gently took hers and positioned yourself just as she did the same.

"On three, ready?" Edith asked. You just nodded your head. "One. Two. Three!" She said as you both skated together. You both started off slowly and it was so far, so good for you. You remembered everything she showed you and it's been working. You both skated a few laps around the ice arena and then skated back and forth. At the same time, she started twirling you a bit and was signaling you to do the same. You did so and actually nailed it. Next you were both holding on to each other's hands and made circles while staring at each other. You blushed at looking at Edith's pretty face as well as her long blonde hair waving around.

As you both kept making circles, Edith spoke up again, "You're doing great, sweetie. Now are you ready for a few new tricks?" "Uhh, I think so. Like what?" You asked. Edith giggled and said, "I'll show you." She then brought you to the edge of the ice and started spinning you until you were like a tornado and tossed across the arena while you shouted, "WHOAOAOAO!" You kept spinning and when you were close to the other side, Edith, who was already at the other side before you, caught you, making you stop spinning. You were dizzy but you shook it off and was told to do the same thing with Edith. You did so and spun her around until she was a tornado as she shouted, "WHEEEE!" and then caught her when was at the other side of the ice. She was a little dizzy herself. Guess you don't know your own strength.


Edith spoke up again, "Ok, dear. Now we're going to do one last thing to wrap it up. I want you to do some more tricks and pull off that big finish I showed you." "Ok." you simply said but Edith wasn't finished, "While carrying at the same time!" She flew up as you said, "Wait, what was that last par-OOF!" you tried to say but Edith then landed on your back. You were about to cave in but quickly used both hands and lifted Edith in the air. You were struggling and asked her, "Are you sure about this?" "C'mon now! You're a big strong boy! You can do it!" she cheered. She really trusts you with this. You couldn't let her down, literally nor metaphorically. You breathed in and out and said, "ok" to yourself and finished this, even though your legs were shaking.

You proceeded to skate again, pulling off everything you watched Edith do. Finally it was time for the grand finale. You then got to the center and started spinning like there's no tomorrow. Afterwards you came to a complete stop and posed like a strong man while Edith posed like a flyer, even though she already is one. You sweated and panted feeling good about everything.

Then you started hearing applause and cheering. You looked around and saw various creatures out of nowhere clapping and cheering at your performance while a few others held up cards, all saying "10" on them. You were a bit confused at that but didn't feel like asking any more questions. Then Edith got off you and gave you a quick peck on the cheek which made you blush a bit.

The unexpected audience then disappeared, leaving you and your skating teacher alone. Edith was so proud of you, "I knew you could do it! You very talented!" You scratched your head smiled at her and said, "Yeah well I couldn't have done it without you. So thanks." Edith smiled back, "Of course." She then got closer to your face and said, "So, I guess this makes you my ice King and me your ice queen, hmm?" she said in a flirtatious manner. You blushed once again and said, "Uhh ok."

Then you started glowing. "Uh, what is this?" you asked in a worried tone. Edith of course knew, "Oh just the magic wearing off." "Oh, that's too bad. I was actually enjoying this." You said rather disappointed. Edith simply cheered you up, "Don't worry, there's always next time." She then got closer to you with a lovey dovey face and said, "Now I want to do one last thing before you return to normal." "What's tha-WHOA!" you tried to ask but she quickly grabbed you with both hands shouting, "COME HERE, YOU!" and embraced you hard, smothering you with kisses! "AHH! IS THIS REALLY HAPPENING?!" you shouted in the middle of a kissy attack.

"MWAH! MWAH! MWAH! MWAH! MWAH! MWAH! MWAH! MWAH!
*SMMMMOOOOOCH"

She finally let you go, covered with kiss marks all over you and you finally shrunk back down and laid flat on the ice panting and dazed after what just happened. "Where am I?" you dizzly said.


Edith laughed and gently picked you up again and asked, "So what shall we do now?" You shook your head and thought about it. Only one idea came to mind, "Well I'd sure love to eat some more of those cookies." Edith perked up, "Ooohh, that's a great idea! Ok let's go!" she said as she flew back to her house while you held on to her fingers.

You thought about what a fun day this was with the lovely and hungry nymph even if she was rather flirty with you, but that will probably happen with the rest of her sisters too.

You looked back at Edith and saw how majestic she was with her bright smile and long wavy blonde hair. You also wondered what she was wearing on her head. Still you blushed at how pretty she was and turned your head back and wondered about something after what she just did...

"Does Edith "like" like me?"
13132221111111111111.title: A very "cool" performance.

14.content:
"Well, Anny was the first to find him when he got 'lost' so I think she should get him first." Everyone reluctantly agreed. Annetta took you carefully from Edith and began discussing your schedule with the others.

"Ok, so it'll be me, then Helena, then Holly, then Edith, and finally Betilla. That sound good?" Annetta asked, and everyone agreed on the schedule. Annetta soon left and brought you to the pier. You looked down from her hand and saw the blue water rippling below. "Uhh, what are we doing here, Miss Annetta?" You asked Annetta as you looked up at her, you had to admit something about the sea air made her sparkle with even more beauty. "Well, I am the ocean nymph. My house is at the bottom of the sea, so you might want to hold on!" Annetta said as she dove into the ocean, you in her hand. The rush of water felt a bit painful at your size, but you managed to hold on to her index finger as you both drifted down to the bottom of the ocean floor.

Annetta might be the ocean nymph, but you can't breathe under water. Soon, you let out all your breath and began gasping for air halfway down to the ocean floor, waving your arms around trying to get Annetta's attention. Your attempts are successful, as Annetta looks at you with a questioning look on her face. You point to your head and make a breathing motion as you also point to go up. Annetta simple shakes her head and hoists you up to her face. You're curious as to what she's trying to do, but now you're really starting to suffocate. That's when Annetta places you near her mouth.

Annetta wraps her lips around your face and blows air into your lungs in order to keep you alive as you finish your descent to the ocean floor. She enters her house, which seems to be inside a bubble and opens the door and steps inside.

"Well... that was fun..." you gasp as you cough up a bit of water. "I dunno, you seemed to enjoy the last part." Annetta giggled as you blushed in embarrassment "Maybe if you're lucky, you'll get another kiss early." Annetta said as she made a kissy face at you, making you blush even more. These nymphs were really flirty when they were alone with you.

"Well, I think it's time we had some fun. How about we play a game of..."
14.title: Annetta Fish

143.content: What else does Annetta have in mind?
143.title: Other

14332.content:
Annetta finally decided, "Whale attack!" You didn't like the sound of that. "Uhh, how do we play that?" you asked hoping it's not what you think it is. "Weellll" Annetta answered while giving a sneaky grin on her face which made you more nervous. "It's where I pretend to be a hungry whale and try to hunt down my prey." Annetta explained while leaning her head closer to you while using a finger to poke your body, "That prey being YOU of course!" she finished.

It was just like you feared. All you could do was try and talk her out of it. "What?! You mean you're going to try and eat me?! That's disgusting! What if I accidentally get chewed on? Or get digested by your stomach acid? Not to mention...I taste terrible!"

Annetta simply laughed, "Hahaha! Aww, don't worry my little starfish."

Aww, she gave you a nickname. How sweet!

Annetta then continued, "Thanks to the magic, your protected from such things." "Really?" you simply asked. "Of course!" Annetta said. "Remember your little... incident with Edith?" She then asked. You shuddered at that reminder, "Ugh! I was trying to block that off! Thanks alot!" you sarcastically said.

Annetta laughed again at that moment awhile back and decided to get to playing, "Ok enough talk, let's play! I hope you're a good swimmer." she said as she picked you up gently and took you back outside her house.

A thought struck to you, however: "Wait! In case you've forgotten, I can't BREATHE underwater!" you spoke up. "Oh! Of course. Silly me." Annetta giggled as she started doing something with her magic. Seconds later, she zapped you which surprisingly felt nice. Still, you had to ask, "Whoa! What did you do?" "I cast a diving spell on you. Now you can swim AND breathe underwater." Annetta explained. Despite that, you were a bit unsure about this. "Trust me. It will work. I've done this before." the sea nymph assured. You nodded in agreement.

"Ok, once we're outside, I'm going to count to 100 and you're going to try and swim as far away as possible." Annetta told you. At least she's nice enough to give you a head start. You simply said, "ok".
"Oh and also, I bet you do taste delicious!" Annetta said as she licked her lips. You were irritated at this, "Ok seriously?" you groaned. Annetta giggled, "What? I'm just saying, you're so cute, I could just eat you up!" There she goes again being flirty.

"Shall we?" Annetta asked... not that you had a choice, of course.
"Ok" you reluctantly said. Annetta then stepped out with you in her hands and in no time, you were both underwater again. Thankfully like Annetta promised, you were able to swim and breathe underwater. "I could get used to this." you thought as you got off Annetta's hand and swam around. You were enjoying so much, you decided to do tricks like a loop de loop. Annetta watched and smiled in adoration. Then she spoke up, "Having fun my little starfish?" You nodded. "Good. But it's time to play our game. I'm counting now." she said as she closed her eyes and counted. "Oh shoot!" you thought as started to do swim away really fast.


While you were swimming, a thought came to mind: That character Dory from "Finding Nemo" sang something you knew very well...
14332.title: Whale attack!

143321.content:
"Just keep swimming...just keep swimming..." you repeatedly sang in your mind as you kept swimming away from Annetta, your "predator".


While you were swimming, you couldn't help but admire the underwater scene. It was beautiful! The clear blue sea, the sun shining under water, the sea creatures, some that were singing. What surprised you though was that they actually sounded like Alvin and the Chipmunks! Of course you were in another world so it makes sense. Not to mention You now know what it's like to be on "SpongeBob" or "The little mermaid". ( Lot of famous underwater references, huh?) You saw more sea critters such as goldfish, clams, and even jellyfish... which knowing how dangerous they are, you turned around and swam somewhere else. You continued enjoying the peaceful scenery not even having a care in the world. In fact, so much, there's something you were trying to remember but nothing popped up. So you just lazily swam backwards, gently kicking your feet, closing your eyes thinking everything's all good.


Unfortunately, it didn't last.

"READY OR NOT, HERE I COME!" A familiar voice rang.

You then snapped your eyes in realization of what that important thought was: You were being hunted by a beautiful underwater nymph! The peaceful music you were hearing just now turned into something from "Jaws". You started frantically looking around and noticed Annetta already looking around for you. Thankfully, she doesn't see you yet. You looked around again for somewhere to hide. You find a big rock and swim behind it to hide. Annetta swam right passed it. You peeped out and saw the mermaid-like nymph swim right passed you. You exhaled in relief and waited a few minutes until the coast was clear.


You looked around some more while in a dark cove right behind you, a pair of eyes appeared. You then had a sick feeling in your gut that something was watching you. Even though you didn't want to, you had to turn around and see only to have your sick feeling come true. You did see a pair of eyes. Could this mean Annetta has found you and you were her snack???

"Oh no! Please no!" You said while shivering in fear...
143321.title: "Just keep swimming...just keep swimming

1433211.content:
You continued shaking in fear like Scooby-Doo. The pair of eyes came closer to you as you got ready to swim away.....


Only to realize it was just a bunch of random sea creatures such as puffer fish and eels...which made no sense but you sighed in relief, nonetheless. You chuckled a bit and relaxed. You then saw another set of eyes and safely assumed it was more fishies. You said "Hi more fishies." as you waved at them...only for the eyes to reveal your predator: ANNETTA FISH!

Your relief turned back into fear, your color turned pale white and you shouted, "OH NOOO" like Mr. Bill as Annetta brought her face closer to you and said one thing to scare you more:


"BOO!"

You screamed and then swam away faster than the road runner on the road. After only a minute of swimming, you turned around (even though you didn't want to) to see that Annetta wasn't even behind you! Still you couldn't take the risk and kept swimming. You then turned your head back, only to smack into something. Two somethings really that kinda felt like pillows. You looked up and saw Annetta with a smirk, who somehow got ahead of you, meaning you smacked into her breasts, much to your embarrassment. "Going somewhere?" she said with both her hands on her hips as she plucked you out and held you with her fist and teased you, "You didn't hide very well." "What do you mean?" you asked. "I knew you were behind that rock. I wanted to do something sneaky." Annetta said getting more cocky by the second. You tried struggling to escape and then tried begging for mercy, "Oh come on! Give me another chance please!"

Annetta "thought" about it for a second. "Hmmm...nope! Now come to my tummy, my little starfish!" she said while bringing you closer to her mouth, licking her lips and opening her mouth wide, "Ahhhh".

You sweated in fear (even though you were underwater) and kept struggling and struggling to escape....
1433211.title: UH OH!

choices: In the belly of the whale nymph.
14332111.content:
Annetta was getting closer to making you her snack, her mouth wide open! You continued struggling to escape. When Annetta was close enough to snatching you with her mouth, you manage to loosen her grip and slipped right out of her hand in the nick of time, her mouth missing you in the process. Annetta noticed this and saw you swimming away from her once again while you taunted at her, "Whoo hoo! To slow!" She snapped her finger and cursed, "Aw seahorses!" with an irritated look on her face. That look quickly changed to a smirk as she said, "Well whatever. I love it when they play hard to get anyway!" She then proceeded to chase you.


You were swimming as fast as you can to get away from your lovely predator but no matter what, she was able to catch up to you. She then called out to you, "You're a good swimmer, little guy. But I'M BETTER!" "We'll see about that!" You shot back. You then noticed a bunch of obstacles underwater and tried using them to escape. You passed through a broken sunken ship, around a bunch of jellyfish, through a dark trench and even through that dark cove where Annetta surprised you. Not to mention some loop de loops to try and throw her off. Still, she's was right on your tail! You wondered if you could actually out run ( or in this case, out swim) her.

Five minutes of chasing later, you were starting to get tired while Annetta was barely breaking a sweat. You wanted to call "Time-out!" but she probably wouldn't do it so you kept swimming, despite your strength still draining slowly. Unknown to you, Annetta had a sneaky look and tried something. While you were about to turn, you swam in one direction while Annetta swam in another. It took you not even ten seconds before you turned around and realized she was gone. You smiled in relief thinking you finally lost her. Unfortunately, you were wrong. While you kept on swimming, not even paying attention, Annetta popped her head out of nowhere, her mouth wide open! By the time you turned your head, it was too late! You swam right into her cavern of a mouth, her jaws snapping shut and trapping you in the process. "NOOO!" you exclaimed as you went back to fear. You were already near her throat. You then noticed her uvula and grabbed on to it. The little bit of flesh was dangling, but you were determined to hold on. Sadly, it didn't last as you saw her mouth open and water came rushing in all over you like a tidal wave. It made your grip start to slip until you finally fell down her throat. Annetta then gulped you up. She finally ate you like an actual whale! As she felt you go through her esophagus, she rubbed her tummy with a satisfied look and said exactly what she thought when she swallowed you...


"YUMMY! HEEHEEHEE!"
14332111.title: Playing hard to get.

143321111.content:
You were spat out into the stomach along with some water and bounced around like it was a trampoline. Finally, you stopped and laid flat on the flesh, moaning and groaning. You came to and looked around hearing the stomach growling, and the heartbeat echoing. You were really eaten by the lovely sea nymph, Annetta fish. You got up and noticed the stomach acid and quickly stepped back not wanting to get digested. You backed up into the stomach wall, turned around and tried pounding it with your fist to try getting her attention. "Hey!" you called out. After some more pounding, your world shook causing you to stumble and land on your back. You also heard familiar giggling, it was Annetta. She answered, "Hey, that tickles! Are you ok in there?" You were irritated by her response and answered back, "How is being in your stomach ok?!" "Sorry, just part of the game, that's all." she answered in a singing tone. You were still annoyed but she had a point. She really wasn't meaning to harm you. Playing with her and her sisters WAS in the "contract" that you "agreed" to. You spoke up, "Ok well you ate me now. So I guess you win. Now can you get me out of here, please?" "Actually, the game is not over yet." Annetta said. Now you were confused, so of course you had to ask, "What do you mean?" Annetta explained, "Well, I read about a cute little boy, like you are, who got eaten by a giant sea creature and had to find a way to escape. I want to see if you can do the same." You listened to her and realized that most of what she just said sounded familiar, like from a movie that was pretty dark for a children's movie. You facepalmed, "You're kidding me." you muttered to yourself. "No I'm not." Annetta said, surprising you. How did she hear that? She spoke again, "Come on, you can do it. I mean look at what's happened so far. Someone could actually write a story about this. Just as long as it has a happy ending." Sounds like you didn't have much of a choice. You sighed, "Alright I'll try." Annetta giggled at your dry response, "That's the spirit. And don't worry, I'm patient, but don't keep me waiting too long, ok? No pressure." Now she was just messing with you. You looked up and saw the exit out of the stomach and there was only one option...

"Well, better get to climbing I guess." You grabbed on to the flesh tight which made Annetta giggled some more. "Boy she sure is ticklish." you thought. Just then, a light bulb appeared over your head, and a bright one at that. Her constant giggling gave you another idea. A devious smile appeared on your face. What were you planning?


Outside, Annetta was lounging around the sea looking more like a mermaid than a nymph. She rubbed her tummy some more wondering how you will escape her belly. Just then she started feeling something that her giggle. Then it escalated into laughter as she put both of her hands on her belly. "Hey! What are you doing in there?!" she laughed so more.


Back inside, you heard laughing. It sounded like your plan was working but you had to go all out. "Well, here goes nothing!" you said with confidence...


Will you actually escape?
143321111.title: In the belly of the whale nymph.

1433211111.content:
You put your hands on the soft stomach wall and tickled with your fingers REALLY hard which made Annetta laugh like crazy! You can hear her, "AHH! HAHAHAHAHAH!! PLEASE STOP! I CAN'T TAKE IT! HAHA!"

You weren't going to stop however...unless she agreed to what you say to her next. You stopped tickling and told her, "You want me to stop? Then let me out of here!" You heard Annetta gasping for... whatever it is underwater and finally answered, "No! I said for you to escape, not for me to let you out!" Boy, she's relentless but you weren't having it anymore. "C'mon miss Annetta, make this easy on yourself or else..." you said as you went back to tickling her hard. She laughed like crazy again, "AHH HAHAHAHA! PLEASE! NO MORE!" "Let me out!" you said. "NEVER! HAHAHAHA!" she said back. Annetta was rolling around due to your extreme tickling which shook your entire world. So much in fact that you were rolling around too. When the shaking came to a complete stop, so did you. You laid flat thinking how fun that actually was. She really enjoyed it too. You can tell by the shaking and her heart beating faster than usual. Still, you weren't giving up. You wanted to tickle her again but your fingers were tired. You then noticed something that came out of nowhere: a piece of seaweed! "Huh?" you simply said. You crawled towards it to get a closer look. You wondered where it came from. Did Annetta eat it accidentally? Was it in her stomach acid and it splashed out because of the shaking? Wait! Why were you even thinking all that when you could use it to tickle her some more? You smiled mischievously and picked it up ready for another tickle attack. "Let's see how you like this, Annetta." you said as walked back to her stomach wall.


Back outside, Annetta was laying down flat on her back, still hyperventilating from all the tickling. She looked down to her belly and thought, "Oh my, he sure is a fighter." She realized you haven't done anything since then and thought you were resting. She was wrong! Out of nowhere, she felt another tickle attack and screamed, "AHHH! NO! NOT AGAIN! HAHAHAHA! PLEASE STOP!!!"


Back inside, you tickled her with the seaweed and boy was it working! She was laughing out loud again. Your world shook again, but you kept your balance this time simply by grabbing her flesh and kept tickling. You then noticed something: a bubble! You looked around wondering where it came from...only to see more bubbles in her belly. They were coming from the acid! You then had another idea. You could jump in one of the bubbles and float on out of here. You ran and jumped into one, with the seaweed still in your hand and it was working! You were floating higher and higher until you finally made it out of her stomach. You weren't out of the woods yet though as you made it back up the esophagus and continued floating up. Halfway through, you heard Annetta's heart again, only this time, it was louder but only because you were closer to it. BABUM BABUM! you listened to. You wanted to make a joke about winning a woman's heart, but you had to focus on getting out.

Finally you reached Annetta's throat. You were near her uvula again and reached out and grabbed it, popping the bubble in the process. You were almost there. Now how were you going to get out? You then noticed something up above you: two passages. You guessed it was her nasal cavity. Once again you got another idea: you climbed up the dangling flesh, reached out and used the seaweed to irritate her nose. Otherwise known as pulling a "Pinocchio"! You tickled as much as you can and hoped for the best.


Back outside, Annetta calmed down from yet another tickle attack. She was wondering what you were up to this time. Then she started to feel a tickle in her throat. She rubbed it with her hand but then her nose started twitching. She was sniffling and felt a sneeze coming.
"AH AHH AHHH!!"

Inside, you saw that your plan was working. She was about to sneeze. You tickled one last time and braced yourself. This is it. Sweet freedom was but a sneeze away.

"AHHHH CHOOOO!!!!" Annetta finally sneezed, sniffling afterwards. She then noticed something swimming towards her. She looked a little closer and was shocked. It was you! You finally escaped.

You swam closer to her and waved at her, "Hey!" you simply said. Annetta rubbed her eyes to make sure she was seeing right...and she was. You then spoke again, "Looks like I win." with a grin.

Annetta was still shocked and finally spoke, "What the? Wait...that tickle in my throat, the itching in my nose and the sneezing...THAT WAS YOU?!" You chuckled at her reaction and answered, "Yes ma'am, it was." Annetta then pouted, wrapping her arms around and gave a "Hmph!" "Well you sure have alot of nerve doing all that to a lady like me!" Is she really doing that now? " Hey! You said to escape. Which I did!" you said in your defense. Annetta then turned around still pouting. You tried to cheer her up, "Besides, you have to admit that was fun... especially the tickling, right?"

A few seconds ago, the sea nymph turned back around, this time looking at you with a smirk. "Yeah your right. Thanks for a fun time, my little merman." she said as she patted your head with her finger. Wow! You got a new nickname! You were pretty flattered at that. She then reached out her hand and you grabbed her finger. She brought you closer to her face and said, "Oh and before I forget. Mmmm!"
She puckered her lips and gave you a big wet kiss!

SMOOCH. "MWWWAH!"

You were completely dazed and your face was red. Annetta giggled and said, "Like I promised. So...how about we go back to my house and relax?" You snapped out of your daze and said "Ok."

"Great. Maybe you can tell me more about yourself." Annetta said as she winked at you. She then swam back home with you hanging on to her finger.

You thought about this day you had and it wasn't even over yet. You played with a beautiful woman who is both a nymph and ( in a way) a mermaid. And a friendly one at that. You turned around and looked at her. She looked absolutely majestic. It made you feel something. You then blushed a little, turned your head back and said to yourself something you never thought you would say...


"I think I'm going to like it here."
1433211111.title: The great and hilarious escape.

choices: "..Sure I'll dance, but I might not be good at it..."
"Uuh... maybe some other time, let's do something else."
15.content:
"Holly's been pretty quite, how about we give him to her first?" Betilla suggested, as Holly dug her foot into the ground a bit, blushing. Everyone agreed on this, and handed you off to Holly.
"Alright then Holly, Betilla will get him next then-" However, Helena never finished her sentence, the wind was nearly knocked out of you as Holly darted back to her home in the desert. She almost forgot to say goodbye, but she shouted it as she left the glade.

You gagged a bit when Holly set you down on her table, she flew at what seemed like the speed of light to get you to her house. After you gathered yourself, you noticed that a radio was on nearby and that Holly was swaying about her kitchen a bit. "Guess that's why she's the music nymph..." You sighed to yourself, as you felt a powerful force knock you over. "Oops, I guess that was a little bit to rough..." Holly said as you hit the table top. You got up and turned to see that she must have bumped you with her hips when she was swaying.

"You were a bit excited to get me here huh?" Holly blushed a bit at this, and fiddled with her radio a bit. "Sure... I've never had a little person like you in my home before. I've always wanted to try something..." You gulped nervously at this, that could be a bad sign. However, your stress was eased a bit as she held her hand out. "Care for a dance little one?" Holly said with a warm smile. It was hard to resist a question like that, especially when a pretty woman asks you.
15.title: Holly Luya

152.content: What then should she do?
152.title: "Uuh... maybe some other time, let's do...

info.brief_description: The lovely Nymph sisters of Rayman Origins shrink you down and use you as a play-thing
info.description:
It seems as though the Nymph sisters are a bit bored after the events in Rayman Origins, so they decided to poof up a human to play with.
Bad news is, it's you. (Or is that good news?) However, the magic used to teleport you into this crazy world also effected you. You can be crushed, stretched and many other things and survive!


Rules:
Keep this only between you and the sisters, you can have them all around, or choose one at a time.
You can die, but in this world it's a bit difficult. Remember, you can be crushed and survive though it might still hurt.
Vore and any insertion should be light. No toilet stuff.
Don't be afraid to get a little goofy, this is a crazy world! Just don't get too carried away.
Please, no lesbian things. The Nymphs can shrink to your size, but they shouldn't do that during the story.
Use proper english to the best of your abilities.
Third person only please. (I.E. You jumped off the table)


Characters: Keep in mind, while some of the Nymphs are wise they still act a bit goofy at times. It is rayman's world after all!

Betilla: Betilla is the oldest of all the Nymphs, but she still succumbs to childish antiques like her sisters. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/e/e6/RaymanOrigins_003.jpg/320px...

Holly Luya: Holly is referred to as the Music Nymph. And is always up for making music or dancing to a beat. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/1/16/HollyLuya.png/240px-HollyLu...

Edith Up: As her name might suggest, Edith is referred to as the Gourmet fairy. She eats quite a bit, but never seems to gain any weight. However, she's still the most bodacious of the sisters. Even though she is just a bit plump. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/f/f6/EdithUp.png/240px-EdithUp.p...

Annetta Fish: As her name might suggest, Annetta is referred to as the Ocean Nymph. She spends most of her time in the water, but does come onto land occasionally. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/9/9f/AnnettaFish.png/240px-Annet...

Helena Handbasket: Helena is referred to as the Mountain Nymph. She's also the most rowdy of the sisters, and has been known to break her toys as a child. Good thing you're damage proof...To an extent. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/7/7a/HelenaHandbasket.png/240px-...
